resources.string: "The major aim is to develop this app to make India paperless" "under the Digital India Programme launched by government of India." "This app provide you a personal electronic space for storing yours personal documents like Bills, Voter Id Card , Driving License etc." "This app allow you to scan your personal documents and store them online." "An E-Locker is an application program which capture the document of user." "In this user can write their remarks also and in this user get the notification." "If user has given a validity of document before its expiration."
